entry.title: Personalized Strawberry Doll Backpack & Baby Strawberry Dress Set Bundle
entry.s:type: Apparel & Accessories > Clothing > Baby & Toddler Clothing > Baby & Toddler Dresses
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leya Doll
Type: Apparel & Accessories > Clothing > Baby & Toddler Clothing > Baby & Toddler Dresses
Price: 58.99

Bundle with 20% off! Our special Personalized Strawberry Doll Backpack and Strawberry Dress bundle is available now! The bundle is specially put together to style your little one like our signature Leyadoll!

About doll backpack:
You can add personalized touch to the backpack by placing a name or inscription (up to 12 characters) on the backpack. A truly unique gift for your little one!

Kindly Reminder for Doll Backpack Series:
- The Doll is a detachable attachment to this backpack.
- The size of Backpack Dolly is a little bit smaller than the original Leyadolls.
- Personalized name will be added to the doll's dress.

Dimensions
The size of the backpack is 9*7*3 Inches in standing. The loading space in backward is 9*7*3 Inches and the space of frontal is 7*7*0.6 Inches. The weight of the backpack is about 7 oz (198g). Perfect companion for your kids for any outdoor activity.

As parents, you know very well that kids tend to be messy.  That is why we designed our backpack to be completely washable to save you the hassle. We provided you with everything you need to know about washing care on the backpack’s tag for easy reference.

About the dress:
Matches with the backpack
The Strawberry Doll Backpack is our most popular backpack. It goes perfectly with our Strawberry Dress! Imagine styled in the Strawberry Dress, carrying the Strawberry Doll Backpack, how adorable would that be!

Size
We have 5 dress sizes for babies between 3 months to 3 years old.

Size 66 73 80 90 100
Age（Month) 3-6  6-9 9-12 12-24 24-36
Dress Length 15.4 16.5 17.7 18.9 20.1
Hip Width 10.0 10.5 11.0 11.5 12.0
Shoulder Length 8.3 8.7 9.1 9.4 9.8
Neck Width 5.0 5.1 5.3 5.4 5.6
Sleeve Length 3.7 3.9 4.1 4.4 4.6
Length unit: inch

Design
Featuring the sweetest and most adorable details on the lace trimming, bow design, and puff sleeves. The high-waisted style and button closure ensures that your baby is comfortable at all times in this dress. We also provide a matching headband for babies. The headband is handmade, so it is soft and comfortable. Your little one will be the sweetest girl in town!

Materials and Safety
Just like you, we place utmost priority on safety when it comes to your little one. The dress is made from certified organic cotton for maximum comfort. It is also ultra-soft on babies' skin.

Our Gloveleya doll backpack have completed numerous safety tests involving compliancy with children's essential health, safety, and environmental requirements. The backpack is certified with US-CPSIA, ASTM F963-16/-17, CA-CCPSA, EU-CE, EN71-1-2-3, and GB6675.1-4.
Shipping
Every personalized Doll/Backpack requires 1-2 business days lead time. All orders will be shipped out within 3 business days of receipt.
We offer FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING on all orders! Express Courier (DHL, FedEx) options are available as an alternative option. Estimated date of delivery:

Regions Free Shipping Express Courier
United States 15-25 days 3-7 days
Canada 15-25 days 3-7 days
United Kingdom 10-20 days 3-7 days
Australia 10-20 days 3-7 days
Europe 10-25 days 3-7 days
Rest of World 7-25 days 3-7 days
All shipping times exclude clearance/customs delays. You can visit our tracking order page to track your package anytime. 

Guarantee&Refund
At leyadoll.com, we strive for 100% customer satisfaction with our products. That's why we offer our customers a risk-free, no-questions-asked 30-day guarantee. We will do whatever it takes to make sure you are 100% satisfied with your purchase.
We have 24/7, 365 Ticket, and Email Support. Please contact us if you need any assistance.

entry.title: Personalized Strawberry Girl & Baby Strawberry Dress Set Bundle
entry.s:type: Apparel & Accessories > Clothing > Baby & Toddler Clothing > Baby & Toddler Dresses
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leya Doll
Type: Apparel & Accessories > Clothing > Baby & Toddler Clothing > Baby & Toddler Dresses
Price: 54.99

Bundle with 20% off! Personalize her own dollies, and dress up like her favorite doll!

Leyadoll is every baby’s dream toy. Make her truly unique with personalized name or wording (up to 12 characters). With her signature smile, embroidered flower dress, and ultra-soft to the touch, this is the perfect doll for your baby to cuddle, play, and grow up with. 

Introducing our new gift set, Strawberry Girl Doll and Strawberry Dress combo! Both are manufactured by the best and safest materials that comply with approved safety standards and designed specially to create lasting memories. Your little one won’t be able to resist Leyadoll!

About the doll:

Personalized Leyadoll (Strawberry) with Gift Bag - 2 Skin Tones

Size

16.5 inches (43 cm) in standing height and 8 oz (220 g) in weight. We designed the doll’s arms and legs to be no longer than 4 cm, for the perfect size for babies to easily grab and play. We develop our dolls with extreme care and thought. In the production process, we ensure every seam is tightly and impeccably stitched with cross-stitching on the inside to withstand your baby’s wrath. 

Personalized name

Personalize your Leyadoll! You can place a name or inscription adding a personal touch. Using the same materials, the lettering is safe and skin friendly. The letters are durable even through a hand wash to maintain color and sharpness.

About the dress:
Size
We have 5 dress sizes for babies between 3 months to 3 years old.
Length unit: inch
Size 66 73 80 90 100
Age（Month) 3-6  6-9 9-12 12-24 24-36
Dress Length 15.4 16.5 17.7 18.9 20.1
Hip Width 10.0 10.5 11.0 11.5 12.0
Shoulder Length 8.3 8.7 9.1 9.4 9.8
Neck Width 5.0 5.1 5.3 5.4 5.6
Sleeve Length 3.7 3.9 4.1 4.4 4.6

A matching pair with Leyadoll
A perfect matching dress with Leyadoll. Featuring the sweetest and most adorable details on the lace trimming, bow design, and puff sleeves. The high-waisted style and button closure ensures that your baby is comfortable at all times in this dress. We also provide a matching headband for babies. The headband is handmade, so it is soft and comfortable. Your little one will be the sweetest girl in town!

Attention: To preserve the dress's design and style, we apologize that we are unable to provide personalized service like our Leyadoll.

Materials and Safety
Just like you, we place utmost priority on safety when it comes to your little one. The dress is made from certified organic cotton for maximum comfort. It is also ultra-soft on babies' skin.

Every doll is made of soft polyester fibers, skin-friendly plush, and filled with high elasticity PP cotton. With this combination of materials, our dolls have the ability to stay soft and warm while being attractive and fragrance-free.
Our dolls have completed numerous safety tests involving compliancy with children's essential health, safety, and environmental requirements. The dolls are certified with US-CPSIA, ASTM F963-16/-17, CA-CCPSA, EU-CE, EN71-1-2-3, and GB6675.1-4.

Free Gift Included
With every purchase of Leyadoll, you will also receive a free delicate Gift Bag! A perfect pair whether is it for your little one or as a gift! 

Shipping
Every personalized Doll/Backpack requires 1-2 business days lead time. All orders will be shipped out within 3 business days of receipt.
We offer FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING on all orders! Express Courier (DHL, FedEx) options are available as an alternative option. Estimated date of delivery:
Regions Free Shipping Express Courier
United States 15-25 days 3-7 days
Canada 15-25 days 3-7 days
United Kingdom 10-20 days 3-7 days
Australia 10-20 days 3-7 days
Europe 10-25 days 3-7 days
Rest of World 7-25 days 3-7 days
All shipping times exclude clearance/customs delays. You can visit our tracking order page to track your package anytime. 

Guarantee&Refund
At leyadoll.com, we strive for 100% customer satisfaction with our products. That's why we offer our customers a risk-free, no-questions-asked 30-day guarantee. We will do whatever it takes to make sure you are 100% satisfied with your purchase.
We have 24/7, 365 Ticket, and Email Support. Please contact us if you need any assistance.

entry.title: Personalized Strawberry Girl & Headband Set Bundle
entry.s:type: Toys & Games > Toys > Dolls, Playsets & Toy Figures > Dolls > Personalized Plush Dolls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leya Doll
Type: Toys & Games > Toys > Dolls, Playsets & Toy Figures > Dolls > Personalized Plush Dolls
Price: 43.98

Special Bundle For Strawberry Lovers!

Purchase Strawberry Leya Doll + Headband Set Bundle to save an extra 20% OFF!
Gloveleya, also known as “Spring Girl”, is every baby’s dream toy to have. With her signature smile, embroidered flower dress, and ultra-soft features, it is without question this is the perfect doll for your baby to cuddle, play and grow up with. 
Leyadoll is proudly introducing our original handmade accessories - Baby Girl Headbands and Bows 3PCS Set. Leyadoll Headbands are essential baby clothing accessories, a thoughtful baby shower gift, and a practical and stylish baby registry item.

Craft

Doll Size: 16.5 inches (43cm) in standing height and 8oz (220g) in weight. We strategically designed the doll’s arms and legs to be no bigger than 4cm, which is the perfect size for babies to grab and play with easily.、

Headband Set:

  • Suitable age: Newborns to 3+ year olds
  • Size: 12-16 inches, adjustable.
  • Weight: 0.35oz/10g for each, 1.05oz/30g for the set excluding packing.
  • Hand wash only

ADJUSTABLE TO GROW WITH YOUR BABY - "One size fits all"! Our bands can be hand stretched to best fit your child's head. The headbands are initially about 12-16 inches in circumference, small enough so that they won't slip off your little newborn's head. To prevent marks from forming on your growing baby's forehead, you can hand stretch the hairband to perfectly fit your baby!



Personalized name dolls

One of the best features of our Gloveleya doll is that you have the ability to personalize her! Using up to 12 characters, you can place a name or any inscription to give the doll a unique identity. The material we use for lettering is safe and skin-friendly, just like the rest of the doll’s materials. Even with proper handwashings, the letters are durable enough to maintain color and sharpness.  


Free Gifts Included

Grab your limited-time offer now! By purchasing our Gloveleya Spring Girl series, we will personalize your doll by adding your baby’s name completely free. In addition, you will also receive a free delicate Gift Bag, which makes our doll a perfect gift sent to anyone on any occasion!

There is nothing like that special connection between a baby and their first plush toy. We made this doll with the best quality materials while meeting the highest quality standards.  Designed specially to create lasting memories, you will be glad you purchased a Gloveleya doll for your little one.

Safety 

We know the importance of safety, especially when it comes to your little one. We manufacture Gloveleya dolls from the best and safest materials that comply with the applicable safety standards. We have successfully completed numerous safety tests involving compliance with children's essential health, safety, and environmental requirements. The tests we have passed are US-CPSIA, ASTM F963-16/-17, CA-CCPSA, EU-CE, EN71-1-2-3, and GB6675.1-4.

Materials

Our Gloveleya dolls are uniquely crafted with high-quality environmental materials for lasting value. We create our dolls out of soft polyester fibers, skin-friendly plush and fill them with high elasticity PP cotton.  With this perfect combination of materials, our dolls have the ability to stay soft and warm while being fluorescent, kneading, and fragrance-free.

Kindly Remind: The current version of headwear is a little strawberry🍓All display pictures taken may be different due to different batch of our products, specific please in kind prevail.



As parents, you know very well that kids tend to be messy.  That is why we designed our dolls to be completely washable to save you the hassle. We provided you with everything you need to know about washing care on the doll’s tag for easy reference.

Shipping

Due to personalized Doll/Backpack require 1-2 business days to be produced, all orders will be dispatched from our warehouse within 3 business days of receipt.
We are proud to offer FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING on all orders, plus paid Express Couriers (DHL, FedEx) as an alternative option.
Estimated date of delivery:
Regions Free Shipping Express Courier
United States 15-25 days 3-7 days
Canada 15-25 days 3-7 days
United Kingdom 10-20 days 3-7 days
Australia 10-20 days 3-7 days
Europe 10-25 days 3-7 days
Rest of World 7-25 days 3-7 days
All shipping times exclude clearance/customs delays. You can visit our tracking order page to track your package anytime.

    Guarantee & Refund

    At leyadoll.com, we expect our customers to be 100% happy with our products. That's why we offer our customers a risk-free ironclad 30-day guarantee. If you don't have a positive experience for any reason, we will do whatever it takes to make sure you are 100% satisfied with your purchase.
    Should you decide you do not want to keep your product, you can return it to us in its original condition and packaging for an exchange or full refund. You have 30 days in which to return your item so you can shop at our site in complete confidence.
    We have 24/7/365 Ticket and Email Support. Please contact us if you need assistance.

s:variant.s:sku: headband bundle Spring Girl Doll (deep-Strawberry)

entry.title: Personalized Pink Cherry Doll & Backpack Bundle
entry.s:type: Toys & Games > Toys > Dolls, Playsets & Toy Figures > Dolls > Personalized Plush Dolls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leya Doll
Type: Toys & Games > Toys > Dolls, Playsets & Toy Figures > Dolls > Personalized Plush Dolls
Price: 49.99

Special Bundle For Cherry Lovers!

Purchase Pink Cherry Doll + Backpack Bundle to save extra 20% OFF!

Gloveleya, also known as “Spring Girl”, is every baby’s dream toy to have. With her signature smile, embroidered flower dress, and ultra-soft features, it is without question this is the perfect doll for your baby to cuddle, play and grow up with.  


Materials

Our Gloveleya dolls are uniquely crafted with high-quality environmental materials for lasting value. We create our dolls out of soft polyester fibers, skin-friendly plush and fill them with high elasticity PP cotton.  With this perfect combination of materials, our dolls have the ability to stay soft and warm while being fluorescent, kneading, and fragrance-free.


As parents, you know very well that kids tend to be messy.  That is why we designed our dolls to be completely machine-washable to save you the hassle. We provided you with everything you need to know about washing care on the doll’s tag for easy reference.

Craft

Doll size: 16.5 inches (43cm) in standing height and 8oz (220g) in weight. We strategically designed the doll’s arms and legs to be no bigger than 4cm, which is the perfect size for babies to grab and play with easily.

Backpack size: 9*7*3 Inches in standing. The loading space in backward is 9*7*3 Inches and the space of frontal is 7*7*0.6 Inches. The weight of the backpack is only about 7 oz(198g), which is perfect for your kids when going to the zoo, playing at the park, going to kindergarten, traveling and any other outdoor activities all day. 

You can be confident in knowing that we develop our dolls with extremely proper care. During production, we ensure every seam is tight and impeccably stitched with cross-stitching on the inside to withstand your baby’s cute aggression.


Safety 

We know the importance of safety, especially when it comes to your little one. We manufacture Gloveleya dolls from the best and safest materials that comply with the applicable safety standards. We have successfully completed numerous safety tests involving compliancy with children's essential health, safety, and environmental requirements. The tests we have passed are US-CPSIA, ASTM F963-16/-17, CA-CCPSA, EU-CE, EN71-1-2-3, and GB6675.1-4.
Kind Reminder: Out of the concern of product safety, we have removed all the pom-poms from the zips. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Personalized name dolls & backpacks

One of the best features of our Gloveleya series is that you have the ability to personalize her! Using up to 12 characters, you can place a name or any inscription to give the doll a unique identity. The material we use for lettering is safe and skin-friendly, just like the rest of the doll’s materials. Even with proper machine-washings, the letters are durable enough to maintain color and sharpness.  


Free Gifts Included

Grab your limited time offer now! By purchasing our Gloveleya Spring Girl series, we will personalize your doll by adding your baby’s name completely free. In addition, you will also receive a free delicate Gift Bag, which makes our doll a perfect gift sent to anyone on any occasion!


There is nothing like that special connection between a baby and their first plush toy. We made this doll with the best quality materials while meeting the highest quality standards.  Designed specially to create lasting memories, you will be glad you purchased a Gloveleya doll for your little one.

Shipping & Delivery

Due to personalized Doll/Backpack require 1-2 business days to be produced, all orders will be dispatched from our warehouse within 3 business days of receipt.
We are proud to offer FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING on all orders, plus paid Express Couriers (DHL, FedEx) as an alternative option.
Estimated date of delivery:
Regions Free Shipping Express Courier
United States 9-17 days 3-7 days
Canada 9-17 days 3-7 days
United Kingdom 10-20 days 3-7 days
Australia 10-20 days 3-7 days
Europe 10-25 days 3-7 days
Rest of World 7-25 days 3-7 days
All shipping times exclude clearance/customs delays. You can visit our tracking order page to track your package anytime.

    Guarantee & Refund

    At leyadoll.com, we expect our customers to be 100% happy with our products. That's why we offer our customers a risk-free ironclad 30-day guarantee. If you don't have a positive experience for any reason, we will do whatever it takes to make sure you are 100% satisfied with your purchase.
    Should you decide you do not want to keep your product, you can return it to us in its original condition and packaging for an exchange or full refund. You have 30 days in which to return your item so you can shop at our site in complete confidence.
    We have 24/7/365 Ticket and Email Support. Please contact us if you need assistance.

entry.summary:

Gloveleya, also known as “Spring Girl”, is every baby’s dream toy to have. With her signature smile, embroidered flower dress, and ultra-soft features, it is without question this is the perfect doll for your baby to cuddle, play and grow up with.  

The Hand Puppet is made with movable head. With soft, foldable and compressible body, to be easily handled by little hands and perfect for creative hours of play at home, in the kindergarten, daycare or the party, they are ideal for puppet theatre, storytelling, pretend play or role-play, as they cultivate kid’s imagination!


Materials

Our Hand Puppets are uniquely crafted with high-quality environmental materials for lasting value. We create our dolls out of soft polyester fibers, skin-friendly plush and fill them with high elasticity PP cotton.  With this perfect combination of materials, our dolls have the ability to stay soft and warm while being fluorescent, kneading, and fragrance-free.

Craft

The material we use for lettering is safe and skin-friendly, just like the rest of the doll’s materials. entry.title: Personalized Strawberry Doll & Backpack Bundle - Light
entry.s:type: Toys & Games > Toys > Dolls, Playsets & Toy Figures > Dolls > Personalized Plush Dolls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leya Doll
Type: Toys & Games > Toys > Dolls, Playsets & Toy Figures > Dolls > Personalized Plush Dolls
Price: 49.99

Special Bundle For Strawberry Lovers! Two Skin Tones Available.

Leyadoll Personalized Name Doll + Backpack Bundle - Strawberry 2 Skin Tones Baby Doll Backpack
Purchase Strawberry Gloveleya Doll + Backpack Bundle to save extra 20% OFF!

Gloveleya, also known as “Spring Girl”, is every baby’s dream toy to have. With her signature smile, embroidered flower dress, and ultra-soft features, it is without question this is the perfect doll for your baby to cuddle, play and grow up with.  


Materials

Our Gloveleya dolls are uniquely crafted with high-quality environmental materials for lasting value. We create our dolls out of soft polyester fibers, skin-friendly plush and fill them with high elasticity PP cotton.  With this perfect combination of materials, our dolls have the ability to stay soft and warm while being fluorescent, kneading, and fragrance-free.

As parents, you know very well that kids tend to be messy.  That is why we designed our dolls to be completely machine-washable to save you the hassle. We provided you with everything you need to know about washing care on the doll’s tag for easy reference.

Craft

Doll size: 16.5 inches (43cm) in standing height and 8oz (220g) in weight. We strategically designed the doll’s arms and legs to be no bigger than 4cm, which is the perfect size for babies to grab and play with easily.

Backpack size: 9*7*3 Inches in standing. The loading space in backward is 9*7*3 Inches and the space of frontal is 7*7*0.6 Inches. The weight of the backpack is only about 7 oz(198g), which is perfect for your kids when going to the zoo, playing at the park, going to kindergarten, traveling and any other outdoor activities all day. 

You can be confident in knowing that we develop our dolls with extremely proper care. During production, we ensure every seam is tight and impeccably stitched with cross-stitching on the inside to withstand your baby’s cute aggression.


Safety 

We know the importance of safety, especially when it comes to your little one. We manufacture Gloveleya dolls from the best and safest materials that comply with the applicable safety standards. We have successfully completed numerous safety tests involving compliancy with children's essential health, safety, and environmental requirements. The tests we have passed are US-CPSIA, ASTM F963-16/-17, CA-CCPSA, EU-CE, EN71-1-2-3, and GB6675.1-4.
Kind Reminder: Out of the concern of product safety, we have removed all the pom-poms from the zips. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Personalized name dolls & backpacks

One of the best features of our Gloveleya series is that you have the ability to personalize her! Using up to 12 characters, you can place a name or any inscription to give the doll a unique identity. The material we use for lettering is safe and skin-friendly, just like the rest of the doll’s materials. Even with proper machine-washings, the letters are durable enough to maintain color and sharpness.  

Free Gifts Included

Grab your limited time offer now! By purchasing our Gloveleya Spring Girl series, we will personalize your doll by adding your baby’s name completely free. In addition, you will also receive a free delicate Gift Bag, which makes our doll a perfect gift sent to anyone on any occasion!


There is nothing like that special connection between a baby and their first plush toy. We made this doll with the best quality materials while meeting the highest quality standards.  Designed specially to create lasting memories, you will be glad you purchased a Gloveleya doll for your little one.

Shipping & Delivery

Due to personalized Doll/Backpack require 1-2 business days to be produced, all orders will be dispatched from our warehouse within 3 business days of receipt.
We are proud to offer FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING on all orders, plus paid Express Couriers (DHL, FedEx) as an alternative option.
Estimated date of delivery:
Regions Free Shipping Express Courier
United States 9-17 days 3-7 days
Canada 9-17 days 3-7 days
United Kingdom 10-20 days 3-7 days
Australia 10-20 days 3-7 days
Europe 10-25 days 3-7 days
Rest of World 7-25 days 3-7 days
All shipping times exclude clearance/customs delays. You can visit our tracking order page to track your package anytime.

    Guarantee & Refund

    At leyadoll.com, we expect our customers to be 100% happy with our products. That's why we offer our customers a risk-free ironclad 30-day guarantee. If you don't have a positive experience for any reason, we will do whatever it takes to make sure you are 100% satisfied with your purchase.
    Should you decide you do not want to keep your product, you can return it to us in its original condition and packaging for an exchange or full refund. You have 30 days in which to return your item so you can shop at our site in complete confidence.
